titleStmt.title: The countrey wit a comedy, acted at the Dukes Theatre / written by Mr. Crown.
titleStmt.author: Crown, Mr. (John), 1640?-1712.
Molière, 1622-1673. Sicilien.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T.N. for James Magnes and Richard Bentley ...,

notesStmt.note: Based on: Le Sicilien, ou, L'amour peintre / Molière.
Reproduction of original in Yale University Library.
Pages 1-2 are mutilated. From beginning to p. 25 photographed from Library of Congress copy and inserted at the end.
